mapper.select: SELECT A.RESUME_NO , A.RESUME_TITLE , A.RESUME_WRITE_DATE FROM TBL_RESUME A WHERE A.IN_MEM_NO = #{ memberNo } AND A.RESUME_SCOUT_STATUS = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TBL_RESUME_READING_HISTORY WHERE RESUME_BROWSE_KINDS ='얕은열람' AND RESUME_NO = #{ resumeNo }

SELECT C.CO_COM_NAME , SUBSTR(C.CO_ADDRESS,1,3) , R.RESUME_BROWSE_KINDS , C.CO_STATUS , R.CO_MEM_NO , I.SCOUT_KINDS , RS.RESUME_NO FROM TBL_RESUME_READING_HISTORY R JOIN TBL_CO_MEMBER_ADD_INFO C ON (R.CO_MEM_NO = C.CO_MEM_NO) JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON (C.CO_MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) JOIN TBL_RESUME RS ON (RS.RESUME_NO = R.RESUME_NO) JOIN TBL_INTERVIEW_PROPOSAL I ON (I.CO_MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) WHERE RS.RESUME_SCOUT_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TBL_RESUME R JOIN TBL_RESUME_READING_HISTORY RD ON (R.RESUME_NO = RD.RESUME_NO) WHERE RESUME_SCOUT_STATUS = 'Y' AND RESUME_BROWSE_KINDS = '얕은열람' AND IN_MEM_NO = #{ memNo }
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TBL_RESUME R JOIN TBL_RESUME_READING_HISTORY RD ON (R.RESUME_NO = RD.RESUME_NO) WHERE RESUME_SCOUT_STATUS = 'Y' AND RESUME_BROWSE_KINDS = '깊은열람' AND IN_MEM_NO = #{ memNo }
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TBL_RESUME R JOIN TBL_RESUME_READING_HISTORY RD ON (R.RESUME_NO = RD.RESUME_NO) WHERE RESUME_SCOUT_STATUS = 'Y' AND RESUME_BROWSE_KINDS = '면접제안' AND IN_MEM_NO = #{ memNo }
